Yep, I tested it myself. 
1. Mount mini image in Alcohol (or Daemon Tools SCSI Drive)
2. Run ACID (inside Alcohol folder), press Cloak
3. Play the game
can i mount it with power iso?
Does this game run without mounting and cloaking?
Anyone else got this installed and running yet? Not sure what "Alcohol" is or whether I need it if I have Daemon tools. What's this whole cloaking business about?
how do i play the game how do i use the crack help

After you install the game and the Alchohol 52% program, you mount it and then cloak it using the ACID program (found in the folder where you installed Alchohol 52%). After that, run the game from the DESKTOP! You should have the lego batman 2 icon on the desktop after you installed it. It will work then!!
